entries.title_d: The scan team has discovered that the Rebels have found the Death Star's firing core and are trying to transport it from the system on a gunboat, called the Twilight Sun. The Empire wants that core back in one piece. You are to capture the gunboat carring the firing core, but be warned the ship is being highly protected by the Rebels.
entries.title: Yavin System: Capture the Twilight Sun
entries.thanks_5: Looks like Storm Squadron sent me the right pilot for the job.
entries.thanks_3: I don't think we will have any more trouble with those rebels.
entries.thanks_2: These Rebels are just the way I like them...dead.
entries.thanks_1: I bet they will feel that in the morning.
entries.taunt_5: Who let this Imperial dog off its leash?
entries.taunt_3: Things are looking grim...for you that is.
entries.taunt_2: Fighters! Focus your fire on the Twilight Sun. We cannot allow the Empire to get that core back.
entries.taunt_1: You cannot escape. That core is ours!
entries.target_disabled: The ship's engines are offline. Move in and proceed with the boarding operation, before it can get it's engines back online.
entries.recovery_success: Nice work, pilot. You have performed a difficult task brilliantly. Make a full report to your superior.
entries.quest_recover_d: Once the vessel is disabled, move in close to begin the capture process. You might want to destroy the gunboat's escort before attempting this though.
entries.quest_location_d: Travel to the Yavin system and capture the Twilight Sun. If the gunboat manages to get out of the Yavin system chances are very slim that the Empire will be able to find where they went.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the Twilight Sun and core into Imperial hands. The Rebels are not going to let their prize get away easily so be prepared to fight.
entries.quest_disable_d: Destroy the Twilight Sun's engines and disable it.
entries.panic_5: I am here to chew bubble gum and beat some Rebels. And I am all out of buggle gum.
entries.panic_2: Smells like a heap of trouble ahead.
entries.panic_1: Rebels are swarming in! Look out!
entries.failed_escape: You let it get away! Report your failure to your commander immediately.
entries.failed_destroy: You were supposed to capture and return that ship to us, not let it be destroyed. Report back to your commander immediately.
entries.complete: Nice work, pilot. We have the vessel safely. Return to your superior officer and report in.
entries.capture_phase_2: Mild resistance. Nothing we can't handle. Almost complete.
entries.capture_phase_1: Boarding vessel now. This shouldn't take very long. Stand by.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Arrival location has been sent to your nav computer. Proceed with the operation.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Stand by for the arrival location of the vessel.
entries.angry_disable: Alert! Alert! This is the Twilight Sun. We have been crippled by an Imperial attack. Requesting Alliance fighter support for immediate assistance.
entries.abort: Where are you going? We do not have any means of protecting ourselves. Your superior will certainly learn of your failure.
